value.0:
DESCRIPTION:
a stone made up by crystals and dull to the eye. all shapes and sizes exist and if kept away from any light a soft inner glow appear..
dwarven gemdealers ofcourse say the glow comes from impuritys and infestations of just fungi and refuse to treat it as anything more then a dark pebble, this ofcourse have had a great impact of the price for in the end it is a crystal and as such a semiprecious stone
LORE:
shade stone, shadow jumper, dissaperance stone, heart of the assasin, many are the names related to this dark stone.. it hold the beliefs to open a portal between dark and shady places and by that "move" the owner from place to place.
